title: Pokemon card event at controversial shrine to Japanese war dead canceled after China protests | The Asahi Shimbun : Breaking News , Japan News and Analysis
description: TOKYO--A Pokemon card game event planned for Saturday at a controversial shrine to Japan's war dead has been canceled and the Pokemon Company apologized for posting an event notice on its website following a backlash from China, as tensions between the two sides escalated.
